name: Burien Behind The Cabin
description:
After a weekend of planning and murder, you are ready to go... But something is not right, as if something doesnt want you to leave the forest.

NOW! With Animations... Kinda...

Text! A lot of Text!

Multiple ending!

Still no music...

Controls:

  • Arrows o ASWD: Move.
  • A (Z) : Interact.
  • B (X) : Papers.
  • Start (Enter) : Pause.
  • Select (Shift) : Inventory.

Made using  GB STUDIO by Chris Maltby.

Art by JuanO.

Thanks to the Testers

  • Eleazar
  • Seba
  • Suguru
